text: palath krida adhyaksha (wa.ba)
issara rupawahiniye sibil nandage chithra padamakuth giya.mamath hariyata uthsahakala eewa balan adinna.
mama adatath dakinne na ee wage honda nayakayek ‚Äô
habayi eeth ooni tharam gahanna kudu thiyenawa.

aya prakasha kara aththe melesa niruwath nirupikawan yodaganimata thiranaya kale narambaannan nirupikawange adum wilasitha desa balimen walakimata bawayi.

pasugiya sikurada pahara ganimata lakwu thrikunamalaye kotipathi wyaparikayage puthraya gampaha - miriswaththa pradeshaye dama gos sitiyadi polisiyata hamuwi thibenawa.

palath sabhawalata erehiwa maranthika satanak diyath kala jawipeta palath sabha pilibandawa ekadu wachanayak ho katha nokara janapathi kramaya pilibandawa pamanak katha karanna athi ayithiya kumakdayi merata janamadhyawedin wisin owun hambaagena gos prashna kala yuthuya.
eheth el. ti. ti. ee. ya mehidi wirodhaya pa‡∑ärakasha keleya.
mema aruma puduma hayibrid panathe mulikawa karunu dekak ismathu kara atha.
namuth owun ma ha yamata wadath kamathi wanne ayi yannata pilithura obage lipiya thula thana thana thibi mama ahula gaththemi.......
ehi rangapa kuda dariya pasu kaleka daksha charithanga niliyaka wuwaya.
eheth me pirisata niwasa pahasukam saha idam oppu kisiwak labi nomatha.
wisheshayenma antharjalaya wage wegawath, anthar-kriyakari madhyayaka ee aduwa thadinma danena deyak.
adhirajyawadi kumanthrana wala pera gamankaruwan wana apa me monawa kiwwath blog pilibanda ramuwen obbata gos kala saba artha dakwimda athi bawa datha yuthuyi.

serasinha piya puthu susanyogaya pasupasata ada damamin es. el. en. kandaye (si. dha. 1300 dakwa) fong lesar/masda motar ratha tharagaya jayaganimata kushan piris samath wuwada, ohuta es. el. ech. kandaye (si. dha. 1618 dakwa) motar ratha tharagayedi thewani sthanayen sahimata pathwimata siduwiya.
na, na, eka dawasaka themparadu karanawa, anith dawase hodi hadanawa.
eeka pradeshiya lekamge wagakimak.
" hari kiyapan balanna dan uu umbae koheda happune..."
udeta wada dawalta eddi epa wenawa...

janadhipathithuma nawa agamathiwaraya pathkirima wyawasthawata ha nithiyata patahani nam ranil wikramasinha mahatha adhikaranaye pihita nopathanne mandayi madhya hamuwata ekwu parlimenthu manthri dilan perera mahatha prashna kaleya.
aya hari kumaruta wada wasara hatharak wadimahalya.

thamata birindak, swamiyek, daruwan innawada mema sambandha dharmayata patahani neda, lokaya man gana monawa sithayida, mama samajayata muhuna denne keseda yana waga wataha ganimata nohaki wima mehi athi lakshanayayi.
in adahas karenne ketiyen, warthakaranaye di sathyata athi badima, sama parshawayak ma aawaranaya kirima saha sadharanathwaya itu kirima ya.
eka paratama kussiya paththen nona ithama hurathaleta menna mehema kiyanawa mudalalita asuna.
mema anathurin miyagos thibune 60 hawiridi wiye pasuwu pudgalayek.

sithala polowama siriyahanak wewagoni padanguwa mudu palasak wewajelara mahathun nadayo wewathatiye bathpatha diwabojunak wewama muragawe pihitak ayadintayidana waddekugen bambaasara rakagantayioba diwa aaye ma diwi galawantayiawi esawuye yukthiya wisandantayidilindu landunge kumari diwiya ungekasiya unge loku loku un ungepolisiya unge kuduwa ape ungenithiya unge hirabatha ape ungethulawa gena nethyuga banda redi kadakinnithiye yuwathiya wajambaeyi ada nidukinobawan minisun wenuyen ana sathakinmara damami aya mara damami sanekin...
ada wenasa balaganna puluwan.
muge thawa kondesiyak thamayi api mas malu kanawanam muta ee wenuwata wena mona hari aran dennama wenawa.
snayu sambandha naha me prathikarayata.
me winasha wenne rataka hadiyawa, sanskruthiya neda?

namuth ewan pasubimakaadala kalasimawa thula ali - minis gatume kisidu aduwak siduwi nomathi bawa mema adhyayanaya anuwa peni yayi. 2016 anka 12 darana thorathuru dana ganime ayithiwasikama pilibanda panatha magin labi athi prathipadana yatathe wanajiwi sanrakshana departhamenthuwen labagath daththa saha ema departhamenthuwa magin warshikawa nikuthkarana karya sadhana wartha upayogi karaganimin mema adhyayanaya sidukara thibe.
ee klip eka karanna wu mahansiya ha prathipalaya gana ma godak sathutu wenawa.
ayahapath kalaguna thaththwaya thuranwana lakunu
liyapadinchi welama balanna.
apa matha batahira aadhipathyaya oya sanrachaka thuna magin ma kriyathmaka wenawa
meya samadan wimen ho samadan karawimen ho pihitiya haki silayak nowe.
akshi kachaye mada ha athulatha patalaye suda mathuwima sadaha balapana pradhana nowu awashesha karunu ( pradhana karunu ihatha ek ek mathruka yatathe dakwa atha ) pahatha paridi we.

shri lankika 250 k swistarlanthayen pituwahal kerethi kirthi warnakulasuriya wyaja deshapalana rakawarana illa siti shri lankika drawida saha sinhala 250 k dena swis aagamana wigamana baladharin wisin meratata pituwahal kara atha.
sinhala wechcha api aththatama api gana lajja wenna oona.
ape paththe enne na kiya kiya weni ankal passe pannuwata passe, me kament eka thamayi oya mata dunna hondama sihiwatanaya....
niliyak wu pamanin mebadu wandaniya charithayakata pana pa...
ithin kampos kale siyaluma gon aathal ganna atharema ee hine
shri lankika bohodeneku antharjalaya parishilanaya kalada, ehi sarisaramin ehi athi wasi thama prathirupaya...
gammu ekak ithin...
obata the pan balu patawun awida ya yuthuda?

ada wanawita thanapathiwarun, amathyawarun, kridakayan, nalu niliyan, gayakayan athulu samajaye kapipenena charitha bohomayakata me minis jawaram chodana (oppu kala haki) ella wunath, owun kisiwek arabhaya nithiya kriyathmaka nowima matha meya thawath eka madaliya nohaki aparadhayak bawata pathwa thibenawa.
‚Äò‚Äòtharaha gannathuwa kiyanna ....

eheth ihatha naduwa wibhagawemin pawathina bawin rajaye awashyathawaya sandaha ehi watinakama thakserukota rajaya magin maha bharakara departhamenthuwata gewimen pasuwa adala idama nidahas kirimata hakiyawak thibunath abhiyachanadhikaranaya wibhagawemin pawathina naduwa awasan wana thuru ese kirimata naithika balayak kisima parshawayakata nomathi bawa nithi wisharadayan ge mathayayi.
